rooms.name: Entrance Hallway and Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with modern aesthetics that leads to the living area and integrates Vastu principles by positioning it in the east for energy flow. The layout respects local building norms.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen with natural light through south-facing windows, following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Kitchen and Utility Room
rooms.description: Modern kitchen design optimized for workflow, with an integrated utility room. The south-east direction is chosen for the water element according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Includes a spacious balcony facing north to promote calmness and balance as per Vastu principles. The master bedroom is designed for privacy and relaxation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A smaller bedroom with a modest balcony facing east to maximize morning light and positive energy.
